name: Spearow

evolution.description: Spearow can evolve into Fearow at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Bird Pokémon. Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: On a critical hit made by this Pokémon, triple the dice roll instead of doubling it.
